item.title: API Threat Modeling Cheat Sheet
item.description: Why We all love Cheat Sheets. They are great to use when you need it but they are also great to learn because they force us to summarize the most important points. What What are the main Threats against an API? Can we find common Threats that apply to APIs? Are there generic Threats we could check for applicability? Could we organize the Threats in Risk Patterns for APIs? Can they be summarized on a Cheat Sheet form?
